patthana18.29:1.1: Saraṇaṃ dassanena pahātabbaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nasaraṇo nadassanena pahātabbo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṃkhittaṃ.) Hetuyā ekaṃ, adhipatiyā ekaṃ …pe… avigate ekaṃ.
patthana18.29:2.1: Araṇaṃ nadassanena pahātabbaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā naaraṇo nanadassanena pahātabbo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṃkhittaṃ.) Hetuyā ekaṃ …pe… avigate ekaṃ. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
patthana18.29:3.1: Araṇaṃ sauttaraṃ dhammaṃ paccayā nasaraṇo nasauttaro dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṃkhittaṃ.) Hetuyā ekaṃ …pe… avigate ekaṃ.
patthana18.29:4.1: Araṇaṃ anuttaraṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nasaraṇo naanuttaro dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Hetuyā ekaṃ, adhipatiyā ekaṃ …pe… avigate ekaṃ.
